content: Initially planned to be conducted on March 31, the examination has to be deferred as it has been declared a holiday on that day because of Ramzan

title: Over 150 Killed, Hundreds Injured As Earthquakes Hit Myanmar, Bangkok
content: At least 144 people were killed and 732 injured after six earthquakes - the biggest of7.7 magnitude- hit near Sagaing in central Myanmar at 12.50pm (local time) Friday, state-run broadcaster MRTV said.

title: Myanmar Earthquake Live: Myanmar Seeks Aid From "Any Country", Trump Says US Will Help
content: Myanmar, Thailand Earthquake Live Updates: A powerful earthquake rattled Myanmar and neighbouring Thailand, trapping dozens of workers in a collapsed under-construction skyscraper in Bangkok where a state of emergency was declared.

title: Putin Says Russia Won't Interfere In Trump's Plan To Take Over Greenland
content: The Arctic is heating up, not just in terms of Climate Change, but also in terms of geopolitics. With US President Donald Trump pressing to annex Greenland and Canada, Russia isn't to be left behind.

title: Elderly Couple Loses Rs 50 Lakh To Cyber Fraud In Karnataka, Dies By Suicide
content: An elderly couple in Khanapur taluk, Belagavi district, died by suicide after falling victim to cyber fraud and alleged harassment, police said on Friday.

title: 10,000 Indians Jailed Abroad Freed In A Decade - How Diplomacy Played A Part
content: Going to jail is a nightmarish thought for most people, but being imprisoned in another country can be a hellish experience. Like nationals of many other countries, thousands of Indians too, have been languishing in prisons overseas.

title: "Screaming, Panicking": Tourists Caught In Chaos When Quake Struck Bangkok
content: Tourists in Thailand's capital Bangkok were caught in chaos on Friday when a strong earthquake struck the region. On the streets and shopping malls, people screamed in panic before they were evacuated.

title: Woman's Decomposed Body Found Inside Bed Box In Delhi Flat
content: The decomposed body of a woman was found in a bed box, wrapped in a blanket, in a flat in Delhi's Shahdara on Friday, the police said.

title: Egg Seller, Juice Vendor Get Notices For GST Dues Worth Crores
content: An egg seller and a juice vendor in Madhya Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh were in for a huge shock when they received notices for dues worth crores from the Income Tax (I-T) department.

content: Chennai Super Kings vs Royal Challengers Bengaluru Highlights, IPL 2025: This happened to be RCB's second win in Chennai with their first victory coming back in IPL 2008.

title: Mohanlal's 'Empuraan' Sparks Fresh Congress-BJP Row In Poll-Bound Kerala
content: Kerala's ruling Left front and the main opposition, the Congress, have united to celebrate actor Mohanlal's new movie, 'L2: Empuraan', which they say "exposes the Sangh agenda".

title: Army Officer Charged For Allegedly Raping Cop On Pretext Of Marriage
content: An Army officer has been charged with allegedly raping a female constable of the Madhya Pradesh police posted in Bhopal city on the pretext of marriage in an incident dating back to 2012, police said on Friday.

title: Pregnant Woman Loses Child As MP Hospital Refuses Admission, Probe Ordered
content: An inquiry was ordered after a pregnant woman in Madhya Pradesh's Ratlam district was allegedly turned away twice from a health centre and her newborn died after she delivered hours later while being rushed to the facility on a hand-cart.

title: High Court Grants Fresh Bail To Asaram For 3 Months On Medical Grounds
content: The Gujarat High Court on Friday granted fresh temporary bail for three months to self-styled godman Asaram, who is serving life imprisonment in a rape case, on medical grounds following a split verdict.

title: 22-Year-Old "Breaking Bad" Fan Arrested In Meth Lab Bust In Italy
content: Italian police said on Friday they had dismantled one of the largest clandestine methamphetamine laboratories in the country, arresting a university student they described as a fan of the cult TV series "Breaking Bad".

title: Bengaluru Techie Kills Wife, Stuffs Body in Suitcase, Then Attempts Suicide
content: A 36-year-old tech professional in Bengaluru allegedly murdered his wife and stuffed it into a suitcase before fleeing to Pune, where he later attempted suicide.

title: Will BJP's 'Saugat-e-Modi' trump opposition's iftar outreach in Bihar?
content: Iftar diplomacy has become a critical platform for political maneuvering in Bihar amidst the proposed Waqf Amendment Bill controversy. Key ally leaders, including Nitish Kumar, face pressure from Muslim organizations while parties like RJD capitalise on the situation to garner support. BJP's 'Saugat-e-Modi' campaign aims to mitigate community anger.

title: Bangkok quake: Video captures crane snapping in half, plunging off high-rise
content: A powerful 7.7-magnitude earthquake in Myanmar has caused widespread devastation, toppling buildings and leaving at least 144 dead. The tremors were felt as far as Thailand, where construction sites collapsed, adding to the aftermath's chaos. A state of emergency has been declared as rescue efforts continue.

title: Patidar, Hazlewood power RCB to first Chepauk win since 2008
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) defeated Chennai Super Kings (CSK) by 50 runs in the Indian Premier League match. Rajat Patidar scored a crucial 51 runs while Josh Hazlewood's bowling figures of 3/21 stalled CSK's chase. Despite MS Dhoni's late efforts, CSK finished at 146/8, falling short of the 197-run target.

title: ‚ÄòTreasonous‚Äô: Suvendu Adhikari urges Jaishankar to ban Mamata‚Äôs foreign visits
content: West Bengal opposition leader Suvendu Adhikari urges the external affairs minister to prevent future official foreign visits by CM Mamata Banerjee, accusing her of undermining India during a UK visit. Adhikari condemns her comments as dishonoring freedom fighters and India's economic aspirations.

title: How to create Ghibli-style Portraits without paying for ChatGPT Plus
content: OpenAI's new GPT-4o update has sparked a trend of Studio Ghibli-style portraits, exclusive to select ChatGPT subscription tiers. Despite the delay in the free-tier rollout, users can create similar artworks using free alternatives like Gemini, GrokAI, Craiyon, Artbreeder, and various premium platforms offering free trials.

title: MS Dhoni becomes CSK‚Äôs highest run-scorer in IPL history
content: MS Dhoni becomes Chennai Super Kings' highest run-scorer in IPL history with 4699 runs, surpassing Suresh Raina. Despite Dhoni's efforts, CSK could not chase down RCB's 196, managing only 146/8. RCB end their 17-year drought at Chepauk, powered by Rajat Patidar‚Äôs 51 and notable contributions from Phil Salt and Virat Kohli.

title: Vances land in Greenland as Trump doubles down on annexation
content: US Vice President JD Vance and second lady Usha Vance arrived in Arctic Greenland for an unwelcome visit amid growing anti-American sentiment. Rebuffed by locals, their trip pivoted to a military nature after US officials failed to secure cultural hosts. Russian President Putin acknowledged the seriousness of Trump‚Äôs Greenland plans.

title: 'Everything seems okay, but ‚Ä¶': MI coach gives update on Bumrah's recovery
content: Mumbai Indians head coach Mahela Jayawardene confirmed Jasprit Bumrah's ongoing recovery from his back injury at the BCCI Centre of Excellence. While progress is being made, no specific timeline has been given for his return. Jayawardene also shared updates on MI's preparation and Arjun Tendulkar's availability. The team remains confident in their experienced bowling attack despite high-scoring IPL trends.

title: Intel‚Äôs ex-CEO on his ‚Äòforced‚Äô resignation, 'I wasn‚Äôt done with ... '
content: Intel's board ended Pat Gelsinger's transformation plan after three years, citing strategic missteps that caused significant revenue loss and market decline. New CEO Lip-Bu Tan aims to streamline operations, boost AI chip production, and revitalize Intel Foundry to regain competitive positioning in the semiconductor industry.

title: J&K: Kathua encounter enters day 2, bodies of 3 policemen recovered
content: The encounter between security forces and Jaish-e-Mohammed terrorists in Jammu's Kathua district extended into its second day, resulting in the deaths of four policemen and three terrorists. Several injuries were reported. The People's Anti-Fascist Front claimed responsibility for the attack, and a massive operation is underway to find the remaining terrorists.

title: Finally it's over! RCB end 17-year losing streak against CSK at Chepauk
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru ended their 17-year drought at MA Chidambaram Stadium by defeating Chennai Super Kings by 50 runs in an IPL 2025 clash. RCB posted a formidable 196/7 with key contributions from Rajat Patidar, Phil Salt and Virat Kohli. Despite MS Dhoni's late efforts, CSK's chase faltered, marking RCB's first win at Chepauk since 2008.

title: Trump imposes 25% import tariff on car imports; Musk responds
content: US President Donald Trump announced a 25% tariff on auto imports, including cars, light trucks, and key auto parts. The tariff, effective April 3, could significantly affect the price of parts in Tesla cars from other countries. Tesla CEO Elon Musk noted that the impact is not trivial. Tariffs on additional goods, including pharmaceuticals, are planned.

title: 'National leadership will decide': Annamalai on BJP-AIADMK alliance
content: Tamil Nadu BJP chief Annamalai expressed confidence that the party's central leadership will decide on alliances for the 2026 assembly elections to challenge the ruling DMK. Amid speculation of a BJP-AIADMK alliance revival, Annamalai emphasised the aim to strengthen the party and address state issues like corruption and law and order.

title: Trump‚Äôs White House invite for Chiefs could test Travis Kelce & Taylor Swift
content: The relationship between Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce may face its first challenge with Kelce‚Äôs potential invitation to the White House by Donald Trump. Given Swift's strong public opposition to Trump, Kelce's attendance could be a source of tension between the couple.

title: Mega Rs 62,700 crore deal for 'Prachand' attack choppers inked after CCS nod
content: India signed a Rs 62,700 crore contract with Hindustan Aeronautics to procure 156 indigenous 'Prachand' light combat helicopters for the Army and IAF, enhancing its combat capabilities. The helicopters, to be built at HAL factories, are equipped for high-altitude operations with 45% indigenous content, aiming for 65% by project end.

title: IPL Schedule Update: KKR vs LSG match at Eden rescheduled to April 8
content: The BCCI has rescheduled IPL 2025 Match No. 19 between KKR and LSG from April 6 to April 8, 2025, due to security concerns linked to citywide festivities in Kolkata. As a result, April 8 will now feature a double-header, with KKR vs LSG in the afternoon and Punjab Kings vs Chennai Super Kings in the evening.

title: Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife Lauren Kyle stuns in pic as Oilers face another loss
content: Connor McDavid, captain of the Edmonton Oilers, is recuperating from an injury and not playing currently. His wife, Lauren Kyle, has been active on social media, sharing pictures of herself and her unique office setup. The Oilers are struggling with a losing streak as McDavid and teammate Leon Draisaitl recover from their injuries.

title: Why Myanmar is one of the most earthquake-vulnerable countries
content: Myanmar, situated on one of the world‚Äôs most active seismic belts, has been severely impacted by a 7.7 magnitude earthquake and a 6.4 aftershock. The country's tectonic setting, combined with rapid urbanisation and historical seismic events, highlights the need for urgent disaster preparedness and improved infrastructure resilience.

title: Putin floats idea of UN-led government in Ukraine
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin suggested temporary external governance for Ukraine under the UN. Western leaders dismissed the proposal, accusing Russia of stalling for time. Despite a tentative US-brokered energy ceasefire, both Russia and Ukraine continued to accuse each other of violations, complicating peace prospects.

title: Virat Kohli becomes highest run-scorer against CSK in IPL history
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru batter Virat Kohli has become the highest run-getter against Chennai Super Kings in IPL history. During the IPL 2025 match, Kohli scored 31 runs, taking his total to 1,084 runs. He overtook Shikhar Dhawan's record of 1,057 runs. Kohli achieved this milestone in 34 matches and 33 innings.

title: AI vs Humans: Bill Gates reveals three jobs are safe from automation
content: Bill Gates remarks that AI represents a profound advancement, capable of solving complex problems and transforming activities like health and education. Despite this, Gates believes AI won't replace coders, biologists, and energy experts due to the nuances and creativity required in these fields.

title: Rape convict Asaram Bapu's bail extended by 3 months on medical grounds
content: The Gujarat High Court has extended Asaram Bapu's temporary bail by three months due to medical reasons. Serving a life sentence for rape, the 86-year-old godman previously received interim bail from the Supreme Court until March 31, 2025. Restrictions remain in place against meeting his followers post-release.

title: Watch: MS Dhoni does it again, lightning stumping ends Phil Salt's knock
content: At 43, Mahendra Singh Dhoni amazed fans with a lightning-fast stumping of Phil Salt in CSK's IPL 2025 match against RCB. Salt, in great form, was dismissed by Dhoni‚Äôs sharp reflexes after misjudging a googly from Noor Ahmad. Dhoni's agility and cricketing intellect continue to impress, reinforcing his reputation as a legendary wicketkeeper.

title: Shinde joke row: Kamra gets protection from arrest till April 7
content: The Madras high court granted interim anticipatory bail to stand-up comedian Kunal Kamra after his video mocking Maharashtra deputy CM Eknath Shinde caused outrage. The video, featuring political satire and criticisms of various leaders, led to threats and an FIR against Kamra.

title: Happy Eid-ul-Fitr: 50 heartfelt Eid Mubarak wishes, messages, and quotes
content: However, the festival has a far more deep significance than just celebratory, as the month is marked by doing some charity for the less fortunate as well. Muslims prepare for Eid by giving zakat al-fitr (charity for breaking the fast) to ensure that everyone takes part in the festival, and remembers Allah

title: 'Boosting Bihar's progress': PM Modi on Rs 3,712 cr Patna-Sasaram corridor
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced the Union Cabinet's approval for the Patna-Sasaram corridor project to ease traffic and promote economic growth in Bihar. The Rs 3,712.40 crore project will develop a 120.10 km four-lane corridor, integrating key highways and improving access to major transportation hubs.

title: Watch: Virat Kohli, Suresh Raina share heartwarming moment at Chepauk
content: Ahead of the IPL 2025 clash between CSK and RCB, a heartwarming moment was captured when Virat Kohli and Suresh Raina shared an embrace during RCB's practice session. CSK opted to bowl first with a slight change in their lineup, while RCB captain Rajat Patidar expressed confidence in setting a competitive total.

title: Watch: Fans engage in physical fight during RR vs KKR IPL match
content: A viral video shows fans fighting during an IPL 2025 match between Rajasthan Royals and Kolkata Knight Riders at Barsapara Stadium. Security intervened promptly, and additional drama unfolded as a fan ran onto the pitch. Rajasthan Royals suffered a defeat despite home support, with KKR winning by eight wickets led by Quinton de Kock's unbeaten 97.

title: Cabinet approves 2% DA hike for central govt employees
content: The Union Cabinet, led by PM Narendra Modi, approved a 2% increase in Dearness Allowance and Dearness Relief for Central Government employees and pensioners, effective January 1, 2025. The rate rise from 53% to 55% aims to combat inflation, impacting over 115 lakh individuals, with costs estimated at Rs 6,614.04 crore annually.

title: Allahabad HC CJ asked not to assign judicial work to Justice Varma for now: SC
content: The Supreme Court directed the Allahabad High Court to suspend judicial duties for Justice Yashwant Varma amid an inquiry into cash found at his Delhi residence. Amid protests, the government also notified the transfers of Justices Chandra Dhari Singh and Arindam Sinha to the Allahabad High Court.

title: India's fastest man! Gurindervir Singh breaks 100m national record
content: Gurindervir Singh set a new men's 100m national record with 10.20 seconds at the Indian Grand Prix 1, surpassing Manikanta Hoblidhar's previous record. Hoblidhar finished second with 10.22 seconds, followed by Amlan Borgohain in third with 10.43 seconds. Singh's performance highlights a strong competition and Reliance's dominance on the podium.

title: Myanmar earthquake: Videos capture collapsing buildings, cracked roads, and mass panic
content: A 7.7-magnitude earthquake struck Myanmar, causing extensive damage and panic in Thailand and China. The tremor, followed by a significant aftershock, destroyed buildings, collapsed a bridge, and damaged infrastructure. Rescue operations are underway as people fled to safety, and emergency teams assess the situation amid warnings of possible aftershocks and further collapses.

title: Empuraan fails to surpass Vicky Kaushal‚Äôs Chhaava‚Äôs day 1: Top 5 news
content: Top entertainment stories today include Empuraan's box office performance compared to Vicky Kaushal‚Äôs Chhaava, Sushmita Sen and Akshay Kumar's hug, Kunal Kamra controversy, Athiya Shetty's baby's welcome ceremony, and the media scrutiny of Rhea Chakraborty. These stories highlight the industry's current events, public reactions, and the ongoing projects and controversies within the celebrity world.

title: 'Nothing new with Eden Gardens curator not listening to home captain'
content: Ex-Bengal cricketer Shreevats Goswami claimed Eden Gardens curator consistently ignores home team requests. The current curator refuted accusations, emphasising adherence to BCCI guidelines and maintaining good relations with KKR. Simon Doull called for prioritising home team needs. KKR captain Rahane desired spin-friendly pitches, but Mukherjee defended his pitch preparations and questioned KKR‚Äôs spinners‚Äô performance.

title: Bueckers confirms she'll enter 2025 WNBA draft
content: former Huskies star and ESPN analyst says she will enter 2025 WNBA draft . there had been rumors that Bueckers did not want to play for the Dallas Wings . she is projected to be the top selection .

title: One room, 300 clubs, 80 agencies, 3,500 meetings: Inside soccer's secret transfer space
content: players clubs are most itching to sign from the transferRoom meeting in Berlin . there are owners, general managers, sporting directors and scouts, agents and data analysts . players clubs and representatives of more than 80 agencies are gathered to talk transfers .

content: the top plays this season are from Hannah Hidalgo, Olivia Miles and Sonia Citron . the trio in the backcourt combined for 61 points, 18 rebounds, 12 assists and 10 steals . last year's WNBA was the second-ranked women's team in the country .
